member.name: MIB_TCPSTATS2
member.summary: TheMIB_TCPSTATS2 structure contains statistics for the TCP protocol running on the local computer. This structure is different from structure in that it uses 64-bit counters, rather than 32-bit counters.

member.name: MIB_TCPSTATS2.dwRtoMin
member.summary: The minimum RTO value in milliseconds.

member.name: MIB_TCPSTATS2.dwRtoMax
member.summary: The maximum RTO value in milliseconds.

member.name: MIB_TCPSTATS2.dwMaxConn
member.summary: The maximum number of connections. If this member is -1, the maximum number of connections is variable.

member.name: MIB_TCPSTATS2.dwActiveOpens
member.summary: The number of active opens. In an active open, the client is initiating a connection with the server.

member.name: MIB_TCPSTATS2.dwPassiveOpens
member.summary: The number of passive opens. In a passive open, the server is listening for a connection request from a client.

member.name: MIB_TCPSTATS2.dwAttemptFails
member.summary: The number of failed connection attempts.

member.name: MIB_TCPSTATS2.dwEstabResets
member.summary: The number of established connections that were reset.

member.name: MIB_TCPSTATS2.dwCurrEstab
member.summary: The number of currently established connections.

member.name: MIB_TCPSTATS2.dw64OutSegs
member.summary: The number of segments transmitted. This number does not include retransmitted segments.

member.name: MIB_TCPSTATS2.dwOutRsts
member.summary: The number of segments transmitted with the reset flag set.

summary.para: The number of connections that are currently present in the system. This total number includes connections in all states except listening connections.
The retransmission time-out (RTO) algorithm in use.
